name: MetaBomb
description: In MetaBomb, players can throw themselves in countless fun and intense matches with others, or work with each other to defeat the formidable boss that guarding immense treasures that could change any players' prestige. The House and Hotel system will accommodate any players with the top services to regain their strength for the next battle. Meanwhile, MetaBombers will show their bargaining skills on the Marketplace. MTB token is the main in-game currency. It will be used to buy Hero Box, fusion and upgrade Hero level, mainly in the first phase. Are you ready for your coming adventures in MetaBomb?
